content: {"name": "Testimony Christian Center Church (TC3)\ufeff", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Assistance is available by appointment only. For additional information regarding the food pantry or to schedule an appointment, you can contact us at (248) 254-3381, email us at: testimonychristiancenterchurch@gmail.com or visit us online at: www.testimonyc3.com", "email": "", "url": "https://www.testimonyc3.com/pages/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "32920 West 13 Mile Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Farmington Hills", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48334", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.5135406, "longitude": -83.377246}, "phones": [{"number": "(248) 862-5541", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
